description:
Redevelopment at 4th & 5th floor levels together with rear
extensions at 2nd and 3rd floor levels, a new plant room at
roof level and alteration to street elevations to provide
retail at ground floor and offices at 1st to 5th floors,
as shown by drawing numbers 1121EX(03)0B, 1121EX(03)00,
1121EX(03)01, 1121EX(03)02, 1121EX(03)03, 1121EX(03)04,
1121EX(03)05, 1121EX(03)06, 1121EX(04)01, 1121EX(04)02A,
1121EX(05)01, 1121EX(05)02, 1121EX(05)03, 1121EX(05)04,
1121PL(03)0L, 1121PL(03)0BB, 1121PL(03)00B, 1121PL(03)01B,
1121PL(03)02B, 1121PL(03)03B, 1121PL(03)04B, 1121PL(03)05B,
1121/PL(03)06A, 1121PL(04)01A, 1121PL(04)02A, 1121PL(05)01C,
1121PL(05)02A, 1121PL(05)03A & 1121PL(05)04A.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - Detailed drawings, or samples of materials as appropriate, in respect of the following, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Council before the relevant part of the work is begun:
a)	Samples of all facing materials;
b)	Typical details of all doors, windows and window openings (including surrounds), and balconies at 1:20 scale.
The relevant parts of the works shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.

Reason: In order to safeguard the special architectural and historic interest of the building in accordance with the requirements of policy EN38 of the London Borough of Camden Unitary Development Plan 2000.

Condition : 2 - No structures such as canopies, fences, loggias, trellises
    and satellite or radio antenna shall be placed on the
    terrace hereby approved.

Condition : 3 - No mechanical plant, ductwork, tanks satellite or radio
    antenna or other structures shall be located on the roof
    other than those shown in the drawings hereby approved.

Condition : 4 - The additional floorspace hereby approved shall not be
    occupied until provision is made for 10 cycle parking spaces
    as indicated in approved drawing number 1121PL(03)0BB and
    this shall be retained thereafter.

Condition : 5 - At 1 metre outside the windows of any neighbouring habitable room the level of noise from all plant and machinery shall be at all times at least 5 decibels below the existing background noise levels, expressed in dB(A) at such locations. Where the noise from the plant and machinery is tonal in character the differences in these levels shall be at least 10 dB(A).

Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the [adjoining] premises [and the area generally] in accordance with the requirements of policy[ies] RE2[, EN5, EN6 and DS6] of the London Borough of Camden Unitary Development Plan 2000.

Condition : 6 - For each of the octave band of centre frequencies 63Hz-8KHz inclusive, noise from all plant and machinery shall at all times add not more than one decibel to the ambient noise level expressed as L90  in the same octave band as measured 1 metre outside the window of any residential premises.

Condition : 7 - To ensure that the external appearance of the building will
    be satisfactory.

Condition : 8 - To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the
    character of the immediate area.

Condition : 9 - To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the
    character of the immediate area.

Condition : 10 - To ensure that the development meets with national and local
    policies promoting sustainable travel patterns.

Condition : 11 - To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the
    area generally.

Condition : 12 - To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the
    area generally.
